mapper.select: SELECT ca.cartid, cu.custid as cust_id, it.itemid as item_id, ca.cnt, cu.name as cust_name, it.pname as item_pname, it.price as item_price FROM cart ca INNER JOIN cust cu ON ca.custid = cu.custid INNER JOIN item it ON ca.itemid = it.itemid WHERE ca.cartid = #{cartid}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET custid =#{cust_id}, itemid =#{item_id}, cnt=#{cnt} WHERE cartid = #{cartid}
